caption.p: The antioxidative ‎ capacity in the different concentrations of essential oils determined using the ferric reducing antioxidative ‎ power assay. BHT: Butylated hydroxytoluene; OEO: Origanum vulgare essential oil; ZEO: Zataria multiflora essential oil; SEO: Syzygium aromaticum essential oil; CEO: Cinnamomum verum essential oil
